name: Blaze Rush
description:
Overview

Blaze Rush is a 2.5D platformer similar to Sonic Rush but it only features everyone's favorite lavender feline, Blaze The Cat!
Boost through levels and see if you can beat your record time while smashing and burning robots along the way!

The story is still TBD and the project is in its Alpha phase. There is also just one level right now.

Have fun, and please feel free to comment on anything you'd like to see in later releases.

Credits

This game utilized the Freedom Engine in Unity made by Marmitoth.

Coders: Samer Elkahlid (TheEternalSamurai)
Oldum77

Art: Zen
Nako

Cover Art: Nako
Neo (Blazykun)
Fuzon-S

Level Design: Samer Elkhalid (TheEternalSamurai)

Music Ripped by MDHEXT

Blaze Life Icon by Zane The Dragon

Special Thanks to NuryRush and Goncas

All Characters Belong to Sega
